doc:
Berthe Cerny https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Berthe_Cerny 0 Berthe Cerny (31 January 1868 – 27 March 1940) was a French actress, known as an elegant blonde beauty. She had a brilliant career, interpreting both classical and contemporary roles. She had several affairs, including with the politicians Aristide Briand and Paul Reynaud, and had two illegitimate sons by other lovers. She joined the Comédie-Française in 1906 and became a sociétaire in 1909. Berthe_Cerny ( 31_January_1868 – 27_March_1940 ) was a_French_actress , known as an_elegant_blonde_beauty . She had a_brilliant_career_,_interpreting_both_classical_and_contemporary_roles . She had several_affairs , including with the_politicians_Aristide_Briand and Paul_Reynaud , and had two_illegitimate_sons by other_lovers . She joined the_Comédie-Française in 1906 and became a_sociétaire in 1909 .
